entry.title: Love Potion Lip Balm | AFRO Indigenous
entry.summary:
Vendor: Natural Wholesalers
Type: Lip Balm
Price: 20.00

AFRO Indigenous Love Potion Lip Balm contains 100% natural & indigenous plant-based ingredients to keep lifts soft and nourished.
  • Will not cause dry lips like petroleum or chemical based lip balms and glosses
  • Contains indigenous ingredients believed to act as a love charm
  • Beautifully scented with indigenous essential oils
  • Earth conscious company with a love of Africa
  • Contains NO parabens, SLS, petrochemicals, preservatives, artificial fragrances or other chemicals
  • Certified organic and plastic free
  • Made in South Africa to reduce YOUR carbon footprint!

Order branded Lip Balm Dispenser >

Love Potion Lip Balm contains a blend of natural ingredients and is fragranced with indigenous South African essential oils. The essential oils used are believed to contain magical qualities by the local people. Be it here-say, folklore or pure magic, this balm is soothing and smells marvelous!

Ingredients

A moisturising blend of beeswax, avocado butter, coconut oil, macadamia oil, shea butter and sunflower oil with indigenous essential oils.  

Caution: Not recommended for use during pregnancy

Disclaimer: This product has not been evaluated by the Medicines Control Council. This medicine is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any illness.

entry.title: Happiness Lip Balm | AFRO Indigenous
entry.summary:
Vendor: Afro Indigenous
Type: Lip Balm
Price: 32.00

AFRO Indigenous's Happiness Lip Balm nourishes your lips and attracts joy into your life while promoting an uplifted spirit.

  • Moisturises your lips
  • Protects your lips
  • Balances your thoughts and emotions
  • Promotes a relaxed state of being
  • Believed to release tension and enhance mood

Order branded Lip Balm Dispenser >

Ingredients

A blend of Beeswax and Coconut Oil with Avocado Butter, Macadamia Oil, Shea Butter & Sunflower Oil. Fragranced using African Helichrysum a known protector and Rose Geranium for calming.

Directions for use

Apply the Happiness Lip Balm to your lips in the morning and throughout the day as needed.

entry.title: Beard Balm | AFRO Indigenous
entry.summary:
Vendor: Afro Indigenous
Type: Lip Balm
Price: 44.00

AFRO Indigenous' Beard Balm contains 100% natural & indigenous plant-based ingredients to keep your beard soft and conditioned.
  • Macadamia nut oil helps your beard to grow
  • East to use: Simply apply to fingertips and massage into your beard
  • Subtly scented with indigenous essential oils
  • Contains NO parabens, SLS, petrochemicals, preservatives, artificial fragrances or other chemicals
  • Certified organic and plastic free
  • Made in South Africa to reduce YOUR carbon footprint!

Order branded Beard Balm dispenser >

AFRO Indigenous Beard Balm contains a blend of natural & organic ingredients from the Cape Floral Kingdoms. It is easy to use and will leave your beard, soft, conditioned and easy to manage. This balm is also soothing and smells like a walk on the mountain!

Ingredients

Bees wax, Macadamia oil, Shea butter, Sunflower oil

Essential Oils: African helichrysum, African wormwood, Cape Geranium & Cape Snowbush.

Directions for use

Apply balm to finger tips and massage into your beard to moisturise and condition.

Disclaimer: This product has not been evaluated by the Medicines Control Council. This medicine is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any illness.

entry.title: Night Pillow Mist | AFRO Indigenous
entry.summary:
Vendor: Pure Indigenous
Type: Aromatherapy
Price: 33.50

AFRO Indigenous's Night Pillow Mist (50ml) contains a magical blend of indigenous essential oils to promote deep, peaceful sleep and good dreams!

  • Spray on your pillow to induce relaxation and ease tension of the mind and muscles (for children, too!)
  • Contains natural ingredients used in African Traditional Medicine to balance mood, depression, anxiety and stress
  • Makes a lovely, local gift!
  • Locally produced to reduce YOUR carbon footprint!

Ingredients

African Helichrysum Essential Oil, Cape Chamomile Essential Oil, Rose Geranium, blended in water with emollients

How to use

Spray the Night Pillow Mist onto your pillow before bed.

entry.title: GOGGA Insect Repellent - Fresh-Smelling Environmentally Friendly Spray
entry.summary:
Vendor: Afro Indigenous
Type: Aromatherapy
Price: 32.00

GOGGA's Insect Repellent (100 ml) contains fresh, ingredients that are effective at keeping insects away while being kind to both you and your environment.

  • Keeps insects at bay
  • Leaves your space with a fresh aroma
  • Not harmful to you or insects

Ingredients

African Bluegrass (Cymbopogon Validus), Cape May (Coleonema Album), Imphepho (Helichrysum Odoratissimum), Lavender (Lavendula Angustifolia), Lemon Bush (Lippia Javanica), Lemon Eucalyptus (Corymbia Citriodora), Wormwood (Artemisia Afra), with Aqua , Polysorbate 20 & 60, Sorbitan Mono Saturate

Directions for use

Shake the bottle well before spraying on your clothes or bedding as required.

entry.title: GOGGA's Anti-Itch Balm - Soothes and Heals Insect Bites
entry.summary:
Vendor: Afro Indigenous
Type: Aromatherapy
Price: 29.00

GOGGA's Anti-Itch Balm (10 g) is a natural, effective applicant to soothe and heal insect bites, containing moisturising ingredients and essential oils.

  • Moisturises skin
  • Protects skin
  • Smooths and softens skin
  • Soothes itches

Ingredients

Avocado Butter, Beeswax, Coconut Oil, Macadamia Oil, Mango Butter, Shea Butter, Sunflower Oil, Vitamin E, Cape Snowbush Essential Oil, Geranium Essential Oil, Lavender Essential Oil and Tea Tree Essential Oil

Directions for use

Apply Gogga Anti-Itch Balm as often as necessary to insect bites until healing takes place.

entry.title: Tranquil Room Spray
entry.summary:
Vendor: Afro Indigenous
Type: Aromatherapy
Price: 47.50

Pure Indigenous Tranquil Room Spray (100 ml) contains pure and natural plant fragrances to bring peace and harmony into your space. 

  • Cleanses your energy
  • Protects your aura
  • Balances your mind and emotions
  • Relieves stress and anxiety

Ingredients

African Helichrysum Essential Oil, African Wormwood Essential Oil, Cape Chamomile Essential Oil, Rose Geranium Essential Oil, Cape Snowbush Essential Oil, blended in water with emollients

    Directions for use

    Use the Tranquil Room Spray in your home, car or working space. Spray as often as needed, such as in the mornings, during big events, transitions and through stressful periods.
